reviewText: My kids love this video. It's short but funny. The mean granny has provided for some great discussions about bullies and how some people just can't be pleased.
very cute kid and adults too we watch em all funny
Be aware- this only has 1 episode on it! If you are looking for multiple episodes, try a different DVD.
Love it!!! We ALL watch it every year...Great for all ages...Another Dream Works Hit...Has special features at the end...Music and Activities
This is a movie I picked for my grandson and he likes all of the penguins of Madagascar and will watch them over and over. Good child movie.
I don't like it but my son seems entertained enough to watch it. Guess 6 year olds can be easily amused.

all madagascar / penguins dvd are wonderful the have all the kids - some mum's and even the odd dad hooked
  thank you
